task_summary: A robotic arm picks a roll of tape from a tray, and a second arm picks it up from the table to place it in a basket.

segmentation.task_summary: A robotic arm picks a roll of tape from a tray, and a second arm picks it up from the table to place it in a basket.

steps.step_description: Pick the roll of tape from the yellow tray.
Place the roll of tape on the table.
Pick the roll of tape from the table.
Place the roll of tape into the brown basket.

action.end_location: inside the bottom left compartment of the yellow tray

segments_of_sub_actions.sub_action_instruction: Pick / Grasp the yellow tape roll at inside the bottom left compartment of the yellow tray

action.start_location: above the yellow tray
action.end_location: on the brown table, between the brown basket and the yellow tray

action.end_location: on the brown table, between the brown basket and the yellow tray

action.start_location: on the brown table, between the brown basket and the yellow tray
action.end_location: inside the brown basket

segments_of_sub_actions.sub_action_instruction: Place the yellow tape roll from on the brown table, between the brown basket and the yellow tray to inside the brown basket

parsed_segments.step_description: Pick the roll of tape from the yellow tray.
Place the roll of tape on the table.
Pick the roll of tape from the table.
Place the roll of tape into the brown basket.

task_summary: A robotic arm picks up a yellow block and inserts it into a white building block base.

steps.step_description: Push the white building block with the right arm.

Insert the yellow block into the white building block.

task_summary: A dual-arm robot sets a table by placing a plate onto a tray with the left arm and then placing a fork next to the plate with the right arm.

task_summary: Using two robotic arms, pick up two separate blue cubes and stack them on top of each other.
